name: HSP_BKT_NAA_TX_TYP
description: The HSP_BKT_NAA_TX_TYP table contains information about the types of not allowed adjustment transactions posted at each line of the table HSP_BKT_NAA_ADJ_HX.

columns.name: BUCKET_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the bucket record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: NAA_ADJ_HX_TX_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of a transaction in the transaction table of the contractual adjustment history table.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account to which the liability bucket is linked.
